name: Breathtaking Motorcycle Rider
description:
Breathtaking Motorcycle Rider is best game for maintaining fitness.Downhill mountain bike racing like never before. Race down beautiful trails, smashing over rocks and roots, boosting huge jumps, scoring insane trick combos, unlocking better bikes and gear for bragging rights as the King of the Mountain! Experience realistic physics and plush bike suspension as your bike eats up the rough stuff and softens the landings of big jumps and drops. High speeds and big jumps means huge crashes where your rider will ragdoll tumble down the trail. Use your finger to pick up you rider throw him even further.
Features:
- realistic physics.
- procedurally generated trails;
- day and night cycle;
- dynamic weather system.
- Customize your bike and rider
- High resolution graphics.
